  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play​(SolitaireWindow window)

    • mapConsecutiveCommands

      public void mapConsecutiveCommands​(int numberOfTimes, char command)
      Allows the same command to be executed multiple times by writing in the script file ic where i = the number of times you want the command to be executed and c = the command.
      Parameters:
      numberOfTimes - number of times the command should be executed.
      command - the command.

    • mapSingleCommand

      public void mapSingleCommand​(char command)
      Maps a single command.
      Parameters:
      command - the command.

    • mapLengthTwoCommmand

      public void mapLengthTwoCommmand​(char key, int pileNumber)
      Maps a command that is represented by multiple characters.
      Parameters:
      key - the second character of the command.
      pileNumber - the number of the pile on switch the action should be performed.
